data.title: Monta Ellis – Basketball Society
data.meta_description: Posts about Monta Ellis written by wcb94, Aram Cannuscio, fonzdefalco, Alex Fischbein, djallen23, Martin Soaries, Chris St. Jean, and moshalal
data.text:
Tag: Monta Ellis

Please Derrick Rose, don’t stray from what you did on Opening Night

Derrick Rose is in attack mode. For now. Last night in the Chicago Bulls’ season-opening 97-95 win over the Cleveland Cavaliers, which was salvaged by a Pau Gasol block on LeBron James in the game’s final seconds, Rose attacked the basket with the ferocity that made him such a darling in the Windy City and … More Please Derrick Rose, don’t stray from what you did on Opening Night

Monta Ellis, Indiana Pacers agree on 4-year deal

Yesterday, numerous reports were going around that Monta Ellis was in Indiana with his family and would soon decide on whether he wanted Indiana to be his future home or not. Well, he has decided to do just that: Monta’s deal with Pacers worth $44 million. Player option after 3rd year — Chris Broussard (@Chris_Broussard) … More Monta Ellis, Indiana Pacers agree on 4-year deal

Monta Ellis Opts Out: What’s Next?

Dallas Mavericks shooting guard Monta Ellis has decided to opt out of the final year of his deal, making him an unrestricted free agent. From Chris Broussard of ESPN: Source: Monta Ellis will not opt-in to the final yr of his contract & will thus become a free agent this summer. Indiana & Miami interested … More Monta Ellis Opts Out: What’s Next?

Dallas Prepared to Let Monta Ellis Walk if He Opts Out

LaMarcus Aldridge has been said to be the focus for Dallas this off-season, as he has been linked to them already. Monta Ellis’s contract, though, will be what is talked about for the next two weeks. By June 24th, Monta Ellis will have to decide whether he wants to pick up his player-option with the … More Dallas Prepared to Let Monta Ellis Walk if He Opts Out

VIDEO: James Harden dominates Mavs with career playoff-high 42 points

James Harden had it going Friday night in Dallas. 2015 NBA Playoffs: Is Superman Back for the Rockets?

Was Dwight Howard’s strong showing in Game 1 a sign of things to come for the remainder of the postseason? The Houston Rockets topped the Dallas Mavericks 118-108 in Game 1 of their first round series behind a balanced attack, including 15 points from Corey Brewer (13 in the 4th) and 11 points and 7 rebounds … More 2015 NBA Playoffs: Is Superman Back for the Rockets?

Mark Cuban Rips Officials For No-Calls

According to Matt Moore of CBS Sports, Mark Cuban has been very upset with the lack of the calls that Dallas Mavericks guard Monta Ellis is receiving. Now, let’s get this straight, Mark Cuban complaining about NBA officiating is nothing new. You can see him upset with tons of calls during the game, and on … More Mark Cuban Rips Officials For No-Calls

Mark Cuban wants Monta Ellis screaming and flailing more to draw fouls

Mark Cuban wants Monta Ellis screaming and flailing more to draw fouls Most players who have a knack for drawing contact also have a knack of going to the free throw line. Case in point: James Harden. But Monta Ellis, a lethal and explosive attacker of the rim, only averages 4.2 free throw attempts per … More Mark Cuban wants Monta Ellis screaming and flailing more to draw fouls

Dirk Nowitzki Believes Monta Ellis Should Be an All-Star

If you haven’t seen Monta Ellis’ buzzer beater to lift the Mavs over the Bucks on Wednesday night yet, then just go check it out here and come back. After the game, Eddie Sefko of The Dallas Morning News had Dirk’s comments endorsing Monta’s great play this season and speaking about the All-Star game: … More Dirk Nowitzki Believes Monta Ellis Should Be an All-Star

VIDEO: Monta Ellis hits impressive game-winner vs. Bucks, but did he travel?

Monta Ellis hit a controversial buzzer-beater to defeat the Bucks on Wednesday night. With 8.9 seconds left in the fourth quarter and the Dallas Mavericks tied at 105 apiece with the Milwaukee Bucks, Monta Ellis stood cautiously on the perimeter, waiting to attack Bucks guard O.J. Mayo and the Milwaukee defense. Ellis, who had a brief stint … More VIDEO: Monta Ellis hits impressive game-winner vs. Bucks, but did he travel?
